TopicTitle: how much was the game when you bought it?

Articles.Content:
just realized the game's price has gone up AGAIN.

it's currently $27 already.

let's guess how much the game will cost when they decide to call an end for the development and make it a release; i am feeling $29.9 will be the sweet spot.

but if they manage to revamp the asset management and CPU usage, and some major overhaul in the visuals, $40 is still a reasonable price

(if i didnt recall wrong, it was like $9.9 when i bought it)
